text: Motion
─A toy sword?

Yes!
I got it at a festival when I was in kindergarten!
I hope I can use this on the live stage!

I couldn't remember where I put this sword
until just recently.

But, it's so shiny and cool, perfect for the stage,
so I remembered it──... Huh?
What's wrong?

This sword used to be really big,
but now it seems... a little small...!
That's strange...

──I also ran around the area near my elementary school
while doing some independent training the other day──

The schoolyard looked smaller than I remembered.
When I was a kid, I thought it was huge.

...!
Choco-senpai, did you experience the same thing...!?

But... the sword and the schoolyard,
they shouldn't have changed at all...

If that's the case...
did Choco-senpai and I change...?

...That might be it.
Maybe Kaho's grown up a bit.
Grown up...
"Curious", huh...

"Producer-san holds the most curiosity!" they said!
Because he's an adult...!

What kind of curiosity do you have, Producer-san?
I want to know!

(Kaho was really energetic.
Must have been quite a shock...!)

This place will eventually become one of the "curiosities",
I'm sure.
